entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:36 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:46 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 09:46 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
